TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Bold extends System.Windows.Documents.Span

summary.span: 一个内联级流内容元素，该元素使内容使用粗体的字体粗细进行呈现。

span.span: An inline-level flow content element which causes content to render with a bold font weight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)有关详细信息内容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 对象等效于与设置为。The object is the equivalent of a with set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于初始化新其包围的预先存在的选择内容的元素。This constructor is intended to initialize a new element such that it encloses a selection of pre-existing content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
